DOC.brief_summary: Right For Me study aim improve conversation patient health care provider birth control . Right For Me test two different strategy improve conversation . The first strategy give patient video watch encourages ask three specific question health care visit , well prompt card remind three question . The second strategy give health care provider set decision aid describe available birth control method , well train use patient health care visit . Right For Me test whether introduce one strategy lead good conversation provide health care usual .
DOC.brief_title: Right For Me : Birth Control Decisions Made Easier
